title: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
description: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
OB: When using BIRT 2.0 RC2, the Preview option in the Web Viewer toolbar only displays the first report opened in a session.
EB: After opening the Sales Invoice report, clicking on the Preview button should display the Sales Invoice report.
SR:
1. Open BIRT 2.0 RC2.
2. Open the Sales Invoice report.
3. Click on the Preview button in the toolbar.
4. Observe the displayed report.
